name: Johan's Voyage
description:
Johan was enjoying a leisurely day in his forest home until he discovers that his food was stolen!

Asking other nearby Gellis for more information, he learned that the culprit came from Las Gelatinas, a city far away.

Johan goes on a journey to find the culprit and get his food back...

~~~

Finally, another game! It sure has been a while since I last uploaded one.

I simply HAD to join Fairlii's Gelli Jam. I love these little critters as much as he does, and it was great that I could craft a story and a game out of them!

Most of the info is in the game, so I'll end it here. Download (or run the web version), play, and have fun!

By the way, there's an error in the help menu: Shift/L is used for FOCUSED MOVEMENT, or to move slower. My bad! (^^;

THIS GAME IS QUITE LONG! IT'S BEST TO PLAY IT IF YOU HAVE MORE TIME ON YOUR HANDS.
